  proposition: Rameez Qureshi, Naïm Es-Sebbani, Luis Galárraga, Yvette Graham, Miguel Couceiro, and Zied Bouraoui published a research paper on mitigating language model stereotypes using reinforcement learning.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Rameez Qureshi|PUBLISHED|research paper

  proposition: Song Wang, Peng Wang, Tong Zhou, Yushun Dong, Zhen Tan, and Jundong Li created a Compositional Evaluation Benchmark for fairness in large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Song Wang|CREATED|Compositional Evaluation Benchmark
    Peng Wang|CREATED|Compositional Evaluation Benchmark
    Tong Zhou|CREATED|Compositional Evaluation Benchmark
